site.title: Neha
site.description: Neha is an aspiring author with a strong academic background in English, Ancient History, and Education. With her MA in English, BA in English and Ancient History, and a B.Ed, she is passionate about addressing social issues through her writing. Neha aims to create stories that inspire positive change, provoke thought, and contribute to a more just and compassionate world.
